thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Brookfield to Pick Up 25% Stake in European Money Manager

author: Justin Baer
title: Brookfield to Pick Up 25% Stake in European Money Manager
text:
Real estate giant Brookfield Asset Management Inc. agreed to buy a 25% stake in the European private-debt investor LCM Partners Ltd. and its loan-servicing arm.
LCM, which is based in London, manages and services about €25 billion ($31 billion) in assets ranging from credit-card debt and car loans to mortgages. Brookfield oversees $285 billion in assets from headquarters in New York and Toronto, making it one of the world’s largest investors in real estate, infrastructure and private equity.
...
